meanings.sent1: The blamable mistake was easily avoidable.
meanings.sent2: It is blamable to ignore important instructions.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat knew knocking over the vase was blamable.
meanings.sent4: The blamable error cast a shadow over the project.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of the blamable action were severe.

meanings.sent2: The blamable decision led to negative outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The blamable prank left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: His blamable attitude created tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The blamable conduct was a stain on his reputation.
